sect1.title: Related Web References
sect1.para: The following Web references provide information on open source offerings integrated with SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring:

listitem.para: OpenStack: Documentation on OpenStack, the underlying platform technology.
OpenStack Horizon: Documentation on the OpenStack Horizon dashboard.
Monasca Wiki: Information on Monasca, the core of SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring.

sect1.para: More detailed Web references provided in this manual are subject to change without notice.
